title: Flowers and Feathers
description: Chrissie is everyone’s best friend, caring and liked by everyone but without that special someone in her life. When her mother and best friend decide to do something about her situation Chrissie is mortified…but will they be the ones to lead her to the man of her dreams, or are other forces playing their part? Enjoy wit and humour and surprises galore as Chrissie makes her way through the dating maze looking for love.
author: Sandra Linthwaite
